us.phonetic: /n. ˈɪntɚˌfeɪs; v. also ˌɪntɚˈfeɪs/, (n. in′tər fās′; v. in′tər fās′, in′tər fās′)

example.eg: Mathematics is the interface between all the sciences.
example.egtrans: 所有科学领域都由数学连接。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 连接, 接口, 交接处

example.eg: The computer interface was old and inefficient, so the company hired a programmer to redesign it.
example.egtrans: 电脑界面老旧，效率低下，所以公司聘用了一位程序员，进行重新设计。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 界面，接口，接口程序，连接装置, 介面，介面程序，连接装置

us.phonetic: /n. ˈɪntɚˌfeɪs; v. also ˌɪntɚˈfeɪs/, (n. in′tər fās′; v. in′tər fās′, in′tər fās′)

example.eg: Oil and water form an interface that neither will cross.
Oxygen is absorbed when the water and the air interface.
example.egtrans: 水和空气交接时，氧气就会被吸收。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 连接, 交接, 接合

example.eg: Dan called his manager and asked to interface with him for a moment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…连接到, 使…与…连接
